title: GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto - Lightweight, Powerful Pro Salon Blow Dryer with Diffuser & 2 Concentrator Nozzle Attachment Tools (Under 1LB)
descriptions: Introducing the GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer in stunning Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto! This lightweight powerhouse weighs under 1LB, making it perfect for salon professionals and at-home use. With a drying speed 30% faster than other dryers and a motor power of 1700W, you'll achieve professional results in no time. The sleek ergonomic design, available in Silver and Black, features Oxy Active Technology for added efficiency. Plus, the included diffuser and 2 concentrator nozzle attachments ensure versatility for all hair types. With innovative features like auto clean technology, microfilter, and LED memory configuration with 18 settings, this hair dryer is a game-changer. Elevate your styling routine with the GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto!
